top_categories.workout_context: Yorkshire Coast Dirt Dash’s uk yorkshire coast, british gravel demands rapid power changes — surge over obstacles, settle on smoother sections, repeat for hours.
Yorkshire Coast Dirt Dash rewards athletes who can hold sustained power without blowing up — threshold is the engine that drives everything above Zone 2.
Racing Yorkshire Coast Dirt Dash isn’t just fitness — it’s pacing, fueling, and executing when conditions deteriorate. This workout practices the race itself.
Over-unders train the lactate clearance you’ll need at Yorkshire Coast Dirt Dash when surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding hard.
The varied gradients at Yorkshire Coast Dirt Dash reward climbing adaptability — knowing when to sit, when to stand, and when to switch.
The G-Spot zone (88–92% FTP) is where you’ll spend the hardest sustained miles of Yorkshire Coast Dirt Dash. Make this intensity feel like home.
Yorkshire Coast Dirt Dash’s uk yorkshire coast gravel and competitive field demand explosive aerobic capacity — the ability to respond to surges without blowing up.
Critical power determines how long you can sustain above-threshold efforts at Yorkshire Coast Dirt Dash — a higher CP means more time in the red before failure.
Low-cadence force work builds the muscular strength for Yorkshire Coast Dirt Dash’s 3,000ft of climbing — especially the grinding, low-speed ascents.
Short, violent efforts are unavoidable at Yorkshire Coast Dirt Dash — climbs demanding 2-minute maximal efforts, surges to close gaps, attacks on uk yorkshire coast gravel.
Cadence efficiency makes every pedal stroke at Yorkshire Coast Dirt Dash count — smooth technique reduces muscular fatigue over long distances.
Yorkshire Coast Dirt Dash’s uk yorkshire coast gravel drains energy reserves faster than the distance suggests — durability training bridges the gap.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Yorkshire Coast Dirt Dash’s 45 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Yorkshire Coast Dirt Dash requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on uk yorkshire coast gravel to build confidence. Expect: uk yorkshire coast, british gravel, uk.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on Gravel Specific, TT Threshold, and Race Simulation to prepare you for 45 miles of uk yorkshire coast gravel in Whitby, UK.
